full_output.summary: I'm skilled in JavaScript for dynamic interfaces and have built user-friendly web apps with React. js . I create scalable server-side applications using Node. js and design ecient databases. Also, I can automate websites.

projects.name: Plura
projects.description: Build a Multivendor B2B2B SaaS Website Builder with Project Management and Custom Dashboard. Architected and developed the platform using Next.js, TypeScript, and React.js, ensuring high performance and scalability. Integrated payment processing functionality using Stripe API, enabling secure transactions. Established database schema and implemented data access layer using Prisma ORM, facilitating ecient data management and retrieval from MySQL database.

projects.name: Netix-clone
projects.description: Built a web application replicating Netix's user interface and functionalities using TypeScript, Reactjs and Redux-Toolkit. Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, automating the build, test, and deployment processes for the application. Managed Docker containers with Kubernetes to ensure seamless deployment and scaling of application components.

projects.name: Pokemon
projects.description: Build a fully functional Pokemon app which gives information about Pokemon and you can Search, Compare, Add Pokemons. Implemented Firebase Authentication to manage user sign-up, sign- in functionalities.
